BP_A3_StrengthQuest_C.descriptionSIU: You can lift heavy stuff and look ripped!
BP_A3_StrengthQuest_C.descriptionSL1: You can now destroy pixel blocks with your sword AND carry very heavy objects AND you got +5 sword damage.

BP_DoubleHealthLoot_C.descriptionSL1: Health fruits now give you 20 instead of 10 health!

BP_BuyGunDuration+2s_C.description: Electric gun will stun for an extra {duration} second(s).
BP_BuyGunDuration+2s_C.notes for dev: this friendly_key has a weird string

BP_CookableMeat_C.description: Where did this meat come from? It really makes you think.

BP_MonsterChest_C.description: There was a freaky monster in there, man!

BarrelRed_C.description: There is a barrel. Try to get it to the shop keeper for new upgrades!

BarrelClosed_Blueprint_C.description: Bring golden barrels to the shop for powerups!
BarrelClosed_Blueprint_C.notes for dev: this item has no description but this string works?

Bones_C.description: I needed those bones to fake my death! Now I'm screwed!
Bones_C.notes for dev: this item has no description but this string works?

CrashEnemySpawner_C.description: First kill those monsters and pick up their bones, so they don't respawn!

BuyArmor1_C.description: Only damage that is higher than 3 can damage you now. Cactuses can no longer hurt you.

BuyBelt_C.description: Be able to float near metallic surfaces. Light metallic objects can be attracted.

BuyCoinMagnet_C.description: Attracts loot coins from far away (steady spinning coins are not affected).

BuyCrystal_C.description: Looks very valuable - can be used for something.

BuyDoubleJump_C.description: You can now jump 2 times in a row. Enables you to jump around a corner.

BuyEnemiesLoot_C.description: Enemies now drop coins or health when killed. You get more coins if your health is full.

BuyForceBeam_C.description: Connect things with a magical beam and have it contract.

BuyForceBeamGold_C.descriptionSL1: You can now also attach the beam to gold. The beam can also conduct electricity from end to end.

BuyForceBlockTelefrag_C.description: The next level of combat! Spawn the cube inside an enemy to kill it.

BuyForceCubeBeam_C.description: You can now attach the force beam to the force cube.

BuyForceCubeStompGrave3_C.description: Place the Forcecube into a tiny volcano and stomp onto it in order to close it forever.

BuyForceCubeStomp_C.description: Stomp onto your force cube to create a big explosion that does a lot of damage. Good when you are surrounded by enemies.

BuyGraveDetector_C.description: Grave module for the chest detector. It now also detects enemy spawn points. Doesn't work without owning the chest detector. Only detects grave that you have the ability to destroy.

BuyGun1_C.description: Use it to kill enemies, to shoot buttons and more.

BuyGunAltDamagex2_C.description: Doubles the damage of your Altfire gun mode

BuyGunAlt_C.description: Can shoot a beam. Use the beam to hit the 1st Fire projectile. This creates a 90Â° attack that is very powerful.

BuyGunCoin_C.description: Your gun's projectile now picks up coins when it touches them. Big coins cannot be picked up with this.

BuyGunComboDamage+25_C.description: Your gun combo explosion now causes 25 more damage. New damage:

BuyGunCriticalDamageChance_C.description: Increases your gun's critical damage chance by 5%. (Only has an effect if you own Critical Gun Damage). Your current critical % is:

BuyGunCriticalDamage_C.description: Chance of your gun making double damage (first fire). The current % chance is:

BuyGunDamage+15_C.description: Your gun now causes 15 more damage per shot!

BuyGunDamage+1_C.description: +1 damage? Is this a joke? Worst upgrade ever!

BuyGunDamage+5_C.description: Your gun now causes 5 more damage per shot!

BuyGunHoly1_C.description: Your gun can now destroy wooden graves.

BuyGunHoly2_C.description: Your gun can now destroy stone graves.

BuyGunRefireRate50_C.description: Your gun now shoots twice as fast! Boom boom!

BuyGunSpeedx2_C.description: Your projectiles now fly twice as fast!

BuyGunSplashDamage_C.description: Your gun projectiles now cause splash damage, ranging about 3 meters.

_BuyHealth+10_C.description: Nom nom. Max Health increased by 10. Don't try this again! It only works once!

BuyHealthRegenMax10_C.description: Only has an effect if you own Health Regeneration. Raises health regeneration ceiling by 10.

BuyHealthRegenMax15_C.description: Only has an effect if you own Health Regeneration. Raises health regeneration ceiling by 15.

BuyHealthRegenMax5_C.description: Only has an effect if you own Health Regeneration. Raises health regeneration ceiling by 5.

BuyHealthRegen_C.description: Health now regenerates automatically up to 10. Upgrades can increase how far it regenerates.

BuyHeartLuck_C.description: Enemies are now more likely to drop health (Only has an effect if you have the loot upgrade).

BuyMoreLoot_C.description: Get more coins from enemies. Only has an effect if you have the basic loot upgrade. Keep in mind: you only loot coins if your health is nearly full.

BuyNumberRising_C.description: See enemy health bars and how much damage you do to them.

BuyUpgradeChestNum_C.descriptionSL1: You now see the remaining chests.

BuyShieldBreaker_C.description: Your projectiles no longer deflect from the skeleton warrior's shield!

BuyShowHealthbar_C.description: The latest innovation in technology - giving you a visual representation of your health status. Bright parts of the bar indicate how far your health automatically regenerates.

BuyShowProgress_C.description: Shows how awesome you are! Every opened chest and bought item makes you more awesome.

BuySilentFeet_C.description: Your feet are now so soft, enemies will not hear you coming.

BuySmashdownDamage+1_C.notes for dev: this item has no description and I can't find one that works, it doesn't need one anyway

BuySmashdownDamage+33_C.description: Adds 33% to the damage of your stomp ability (if owned). Only affects enemies, not things.

BuySmashdownDamage+3_C.notes for dev: this item has no description and I can't find one that works, it doesn't need one anyway

BuySmashdownRadius+_C.description: Adds 50cm to the radius of the stomp attack, giving it a radius of:

BuySmashdown_C.description: Stomp down while in the air to push down things and to destroy things or enemies.

BuySwordCriticalDamageChance_C.description: Increases chance of critical sword damage by 5%. Only applies if you have the critical damage upgrade. Your critical % is now:

BuySwordCriticalDamage_C.description: Your sword has a chance to make double damage. The current % chance is:

BuySwordDamage+02_C.notes for dev: this item has no description and I can't find one that works, it doesn't need one anyway

BuySwordDamage+1_C.notes for dev: this item has no description and I can't find one that works, it doesn't need one anyway

BuySwordDamage+3_C.notes for dev: this item has no description and I can't find one that works, it doesn't need one anyway

BuySwordHoly1_C.description: You can now destroy wooden graves and prevent enemy respawning from these.

BuySwordHoly2_C.description: You can now destroy stone graves and prevent enemy respawning from these.

BuySwordRange25_C.description: You can now hit enemies that are a bit farther away.

BuySwordRefireRate-33_C.description: You can swing your sword much faster now with less waiting time between each hit.

BuySword_C.description: Is not dangerous anymore if you have one of these!  Causes 2 damage.

BuyTranslocatorCoolDownHalf_C.description: Translocator can be fired twice as often

BuyTranslocatorDamagex3_C.description: Translocator ball will cause twice as much damage

BuyTranslocatorShotForce_C.descriptionSL1: Translocator will be fired twice as hard

BuyTranslocatorModule_C.description: You can now teleport yourself to the ball.

BuyTranslocatorWeight_C.description: Makes the ball three times as heavy

BuyTranslocator_C.description: A green gun. What does it do?

BuyTripleJump_C.description: You can now jump 3 times in a row. Enough to get across big gaps and jump around corners.

BuyUpgradeGraveNum_C.description: You now see the number of remaining enemy spawn points (graves, hellholes).

BuyWalletx15_C.description: You can now carry more money!

BuyWalletx2_C.description: You can now carry twice as much money.
